backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining types and CRUD-style functions for daily briefs, research items, portfolio snapshots, alert rules, profiles, and assets using in‑memory maps.
feature_evidence.json: Machine-readable feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of various frontend source files and components.
frontend/DRAFT_PREVIEW.md: Guide describing how to run a local preview build of PulseBrief for testing without deployment.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS config with light/dark theme variables and base styling rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the root React app and including favicon and metadata.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines TanStack Router configuration with public and protected routes, ThemeProvider, AppShell, and route tree setup.
frontend/src/components/auth/PrototypeSi: Email-based sign-in modal for the prototype with validation, toast feedback, and session state updates.
frontend/src/components/brand/ClickableW: Clickable PulseBrief wordmark button that navigates to the home route.
frontend/src/components/brand/Wordmark.t: Simple component rendering the PulseBrief wordmark image with size variants.
frontend/src/components/brief/YesterdayV: Compares today's and yesterday's brief scores and displays deltas with icons. Shows a placeholder card if either day is missing.
frontend/src/components/charts/ChartPlac: Renders a generic placeholder card for charts with a title, description, and icon.
frontend/src/components/common/DemoState: Displays a small badge indicating the UI is in a demo or preview state.
frontend/src/components/common/ScorePill: Shows a colored pill displaying score/max with color based on percentage and size options.
frontend/src/components/common/StandardS: Displays a labeled score with tooltip explanation, sanitizing the explanation to one sentence.
frontend/src/components/compliance/Discl: Footer bar showing a non‑advice disclaimer and a copyright notice with branding links.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppNav.ts: Top navigation bar with routes, active state, user info, and logout handling.
Wraps the app layout with navigation, main content area, and footer disclaimer.
frontend/src/components/layout/Protected: Gatekeeper component redirecting unauthenticated users to sign‑in and optionally showing a modal.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/AssetE: Form for adding a portfolio asset with validation, sign‑in enforcement, and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/states/EmptyStat: Centered empty state component with icon, title, description, and optional action.
frontend/src/components/states/LoadingSt: Skeleton-based loading placeholder showing heading and card loaders.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, login/logout handling, and identity persistence via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useRequirePrototypeSi: Utility hook enforcing prototype sign‑in, redirecting and showing a toast when required.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining light/dark theme CSS variables and base global styles.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides a utility function that merges class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point mounting React, setting up React Query and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AlertsRulesPage.tsx: Displays predefined alert rules with toggle controls, syncing state via alertsQueries.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Marketing-style landing page with navigation buttons and feature highlights.
frontend/src/pages/LibraryHistoryPage.ts: Shows library access states depending on sign‑in and Pro status, with locked/prototype UI.
frontend/src/pages/PortfolioPage.tsx: Portfolio health view using demo or user data, with asset editor controls and snapshot analysis.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Profile settings page handling sign‑in, timezone, and topic preferences with update actions.
frontend/src/pages/ResearchModePage.tsx: UI page for selecting topics, generating placeholder research items via mutations, and displaying or saving research results.
frontend/src/pages/RootPage.tsx: Redirects signed‑in users to the brief page and otherwise renders the landing page.
frontend/src/pages/TodaysBriefPage.tsx: Displays today’s brief with demo fallback, handles generation of new briefs, and shows loading or empty states.
frontend/src/queries/alertsQueries.ts: Provides alert rule fetching, creation, toggling, and auto‑ensuring predefined rules using react‑query.
frontend/src/queries/briefQueries.ts: Fetches and sorts daily briefs and provides a mutation for creating new briefs.
frontend/src/queries/libraryQueries.ts: Loads briefs, research items, and portfolio snapshots for the library section using react‑query.
frontend/src/queries/portfolioQueries.ts: Retrieves portfolio snapshots and exposes mutations to add assets and create snapshots.
frontend/src/queries/profileQueries.ts: Fetches and updates user profiles keyed by email via react‑query.
frontend/src/queries/researchQueries.ts: Provides research item retrieval plus mutations for creating and saving research entries.
frontend/src/state/usePrototypeSession.t: Zustand store persisting a prototype session email with setters to update or clear it.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling themes, custom colors, typography, animations, and container queries.
project_state.json: Describes the PulseBrief prototype’s state, including versioning, feature summaries, design principles, known issues, and compliance requirements. Documents existing UX/UI architecture, dark fintech theme goals, and constraints for copy-only updates without redeployment.
